long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom Bookmarks - is a visualization experiment for chrome bookmarks that allows you to use different views and search. At a later stage more actions will be added, like delete, drag & drop bookmarks to folders, and more views.
